definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: wall, bulwark (Talm. [[אָשִׁיתָא]] (Levy Nö); Mand. [[אשיתא]] wall Nö:M 113; Targum pl. sf. [[אֲשִׁיתָהָא]] (Dalm:WB [[אָשְׁיָתַהָא]]) Je 50:15, [[אשיתנא]] Ct So 2:9; Ar. 0’asiyah;un column, support is loan-word acc. to Frä:11);—only pl. sf. bulwarks of city of Babylon,’ etc.
